markdownRemark.excerpt: So, I haven’t posted anything for a few weeks. As I have mentioned in other places I recently left a job to start a new career as a software developer. Part of…
markdownRemark.html:
So, I haven’t posted anything for a few weeks. As I have mentioned in other places I recently left a job to start a new career as a software developer. Part of this change involved moving from Tucson to Austin Texas. With a detour to Idaho to visit family and friends.

While I was in Idaho, I was actually able to take care of the site redesign I had been wanting to do as well as push out a bunch of articles. However, two weeks ago I had to make the long journey down to Austin. Which prevented me from putting any time towards writing. But, now I am finally semi settled here and am diving back in to writing.

Right now I am working on a series of write ups about a tweet storm and podcast series that Naval Ravikant recently put out. Once I finish with that, I am going to start doing write ups of books I have been reading and trying to build some actionable plans for people to improve their thought processes.

frontmatter.title: Big Changes in Life
frontmatter.description: Things have been quiet here for the past few weeks, because I was in the process of moving!

frontmatter.title: Seek Wealth, Not Money or Status - My Thoughts
